channel.title: Maps on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Maps on A Hugo website

item.title: Dead Dogs live concerts map since 2014
item.description: library(here) library(tidyverse) library(funModeling) library(readxl) library(leaflet) library(leaflet.extras) # Get data # Using the .xlsx file locally with here() package # here::here() # dd_concerts <- read_excel(here("data","Dead Dogs Live Concerts.xlsx"), sheet = "Sheet1") # Or alternatively Using the .csv file stored on github in the Dead Dogs Analytics repository dd_concerts <- as_tibble(read.csv(file="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/asperanz/Dead-Dogs-Analytics/master/data/Dead%20Dogs%20Live%20Concerts.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",", stringsAsFactors=FALSE)) # Map of concerts leaflet(dd_concerts) %>% # addProviderTiles("CartoDB.
